Name: Stabilization Mek: Pwetty Pwease
Desc: A filming device created by the engineer Helene that can remain stable and film actors even in high-speed motion, or don a doll outfit to be part of crowd shots filmed from a distance. For some reason, one is distinctly reminded of Helene's distressed expression during testing whenever one looks at the tear-stained eyes of the Blubberbeast doll on the imaging platform.
